subject: Fishing, Sport
lead_paragraph: A Wartburg, Tenn., man who chose fishing over a pharmacy career won the biggest prize in bass fishing, the $500,000 Forrest Wood Cup, which was held on Lake Ouachita in Arkansas.
snippet: A Wartburg, Tenn., man who chose fishing over a pharmacy career won the biggest prize in bass fishing, the $500,000 Forrest Wood Cup, which was held on Lake Ouachita in Arkansas.
